display_long_description:
GRAB YOUR WINGS AND FLY.

In Somnia, your movement is limitless.
You can use your wings to fly, you can cut corners and choose your own path through the level.

FORGET BUTTONS. USE GESTURES.

Somnia is not your typical VR game. It challenges you to use your hand and body movements to control your actions. You don’t rely on sticks or buttons, but on gestures and motions. You can walk, jump, climb, fly, and cast spells with natural ease and fluidity.

FAST-PACED MAGIC COMBAT.

You will experience fast-paced action full of spell casting and physical movement. There is no right way to go through the level - use your imagination to fight through the nightmares. Somnia is a game that will stimulate your skills and creativity.

UNIQUE SURREAL WORLDS.

You will experience stunning environments and surreal landscapes as you explore the level. Are you ready to enter the dreamy world of Somnia and discover what awaits you?

SIGN UP FOR TESTING.

This is a early-access demo version of Somnia that includes the first level of the game. We are working hard to release the full game with more levels, features, and surprises. Stay tuned for updates and news on our Discord server.

We are currently looking for testers to hear your feedback and suggestions.Your input is extremely valuable for us to help us shape Somnia into the best VR experience possible. To become a tester, all you have to do is react in the “sign up for testing” channel on our discord server and follow the instructions there.
